name: Details and Bookings
raw_text:
=== TOUR START: Details and Bookings ===
top of page Details and Bookings To play, press and hold the enter key. To stop, release the enter key. Sunset Sail Across The Bay Departure 5:00pm Return 7:00pm Duration 2hrs Max Guests 24 Description Our classic sunset sail, voted one of the ten best things to do in Airlie takes you out across the bay where we catch the breeze to set sail. Hoist a sail or chill and slip into the sunset in style with a welcome glass of bubbles and nibbles. Inclusions Free glass of bubbles upon boarding. Cheese, bread and nibbles platter (with seasonal fruit). We suggest bringing a warm clothes and jacket in winter months. Please note; As we're fully licensed, we don't allow any BYOG. Optional Treats Available Extras Charcuterie Grazing Platter for two Bottle of Moet Book Your Sail CHOOSE YOUR ADD-ONS DELICIOUS FOOD PACKAGES BEVERAGE PACKAGES AMAZING ACCOMM ISLAND PICKUPS AND HELICOPTERS Can we help you decide which sail event is right for you? Just give us a call! ​ 0427 882 062 Previous Next bottom of page

Sunset Sail Across The Bay
Departure
5:00pm
Return
7:00pm
Duration
2hrs
Max Guests
Description
Our classic sunset sail, voted one of the ten best things to do in Airlie takes you out across the bay where we catch the breeze to set sail. Hoist a sail or chill and slip into the sunset in style with a welcome glass of bubbles and nibbles.
Inclusions
Free glass of bubbles upon boarding. Cheese, bread and nibbles platter (with seasonal fruit). We suggest bringing a warm clothes and jacket in winter months. Please note; As we're fully licensed, we don't allow any BYOG.
• Free glass of bubbles upon boarding.

• We suggest bringing a warm clothes and jacket in winter months.
